MethodDescription: Air temperature is sampled by a Campbell Scientific model 107 thermistor housed in a R.M. Young Model 43502 compact aspirated shield at 350 cm height and mean temperature is output every 15 minutes
Air temperature is sampled by a Campbell Scientific model 107 thermistor housed in a R.M. Young Model 43502 compact aspirated shield at 350 cm height and mean temperature is output every 5 minutes

Air temperature is sampled by a Campbell Scientific model 107 thermistor housed in a R.M. Young Model 43502 compact aspirated shield at 350 cm height and mean, min and max temperature is output every 5 minutes
